title: Stuffed Cabbage Parcels (Emerald Red Jade Bags)

ingredients.content: 8 gai choy leaves, large whole leaves
4 ½ oz boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into pieces
3 ½ oz carrots, cut into pieces
3 ½ oz yellow onions, cut into pieces
1 oz yellow onions, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, place in whole cabbage leaves and Chinese chives, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma and set aside. Discard water.
Place chicken into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place carrots, onions, garlic and mushrooms into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>5 min/212°F/speed 0.5<b>.
Add reserved chicken, rice wine, fermented bean paste, white pepper and soy sauce and cook <b>5 min/212°F//speed 0.5<b>. Transfer to bowl and set aside.
Place onions and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>2 min/212°F/speed 0.5<b>.
Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, sugar and salt. Place Varoma into position.

Make cabbage parcels by dividing the reserved minced chicken mixture onto the center of the reserved cabbage leaves. Fold up each cabbage leaf and gently twist to seal the parcel and tie with reserved Chinese chives. Place cabbage parcels into Varoma, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma.
Purée tomato mixture <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>-10<b> increasing speed gradually. Serve hot cabbage parcels with hot tomato sauce.
